title: Milwaukee Bucks Owner Lasry on Making Money in the NBA
itunes:title: Milwaukee Bucks Owner Lasry on Making Money in the NBA
description:
Marc Lasry is co-owner of the National Basketball Association’s Milwaukee Bucks. He’s also the chairman and chief executive officer of Avenue Capital Management, the investment management company he co-founded more than a decade ago. Lasry speaks with Bloomberg Business of Sports co-hosts Scott Soshnick and Michael Barr about the business of basketball and his 2014 purchase of the team for a record $550 million.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
